About Me

I'm Computer Science (Information Security and Assurance) graduate. Based in Malaysia. I'm interested in cybersecurity once I stepped my foot in degree. I had few experiences participating in CTFs during my study and internship (Check out my LinkedIn). Above all, I'm still beginner, willing to learn more from time to time.

I'm so immersed with Web3 back then andd decide to make a Blockchain web application using Solidity for my Final Year Project. NetbyteSEC Sdn Bhd

  • Security Analyst Intern

As an intern here, I got so much exposure on red team practices. Start from enumerate information, to privilege escalation. Other than that, m friends and I had working on IVRE project. Since IVRE is an open source software, we configure and customize IVRE according to our Director Manager required which is to scan port 80 and port 445 only. We use Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine, Digital Ocean as server fro IVRE website, and data from NirSoft. Then we export NDIJSON file from IVRE website to SPLUNK for further analysis.

Check it out
